column2: Well, as I live and breathe. I’ve been around for quite a long time, but I’ve never in my life seen a Jiant who wasn’t part of the Bahamutian Army.
The Bahamutian Army is gone at last, and now we can finally live our lives in peace.
Oh, what are we going to do? What’s going to happen to us now?
There’s nothing better than peace and quiet.
